hero.title: Your Accountant from start to growth.
hero.subtitle: LEAP by LLL gives Hong Kong founders a dedicated CPA, smart cloud accounting, and stress‑free compliance, so you can focus on building – not chasing deadlines.

features.heading: Packed with thousands of features
features.subheading: From Image generation to video generation, Everything AI has APIs for literally everything. It can even create this website copy for you.

generateImages.title: Generate images with text
generateImages.description: Generate images from a text prompt, a video, or a video segment in bulk at the speed of light.

chatbots.title: Create stupid simple chatbots
chatbots.description: Create Chatbots with a single button click. Customize as per your requirements and the AI will take care of the rest.

llmSupport.title: We support every single LLM
llmSupport.description: Whether it's OpenAI, GroQ or Your Mom's Basement LLM, we support everything.

deploy.title: Deploy in seconds
deploy.description: With our blazing fast, state of the art, cutting edge, we are so back cloud servies (read AWS) - you can deploy your model in seconds.

gridFeatures.heading: Scale your content generation with Everything AI
gridFeatures.subheading: From social media posts to long form blog posts, Everything AI can generate content that is indistinguishable from human written content.

generateContent.title: Generate content at scale
generateContent.description: Generate everything from blog posts to emails to social media posts at the speed of light.

security.title: Bank level security
security.description: Your data is protected by the same security measures used by banks.

analytics.title: Deep insights and analytics
analytics.description: Track your content performance with our built-in analytics dashboard.

support.title: 24/7 Customer Support
support.description: Our support team is available 24/7 to help you with any issues.

integration.title: Seamless integration
integration.description: Integrate with your existing tools and workflows in minutes.

customization.title: Fully customizable
customization.description: Customize every aspect of your AI to match your brand and style.
